data.meanings: to be a lord and master, collect, possess/owner, rule, increase, complete, bring up, preserve, chief, determiner, provider, sustainer, perfecter, rewarder, creator, maintainer, reposer of properties, developer, former of rules and laws of the growth, foster a thing in such a manner as to make it attain one condition after another until it reaches its goal of completion.
data.sentence: The word رَبِّ comes from the root ر ب ب and is associated with the meanings: to be a lord and master, collect, possess/owner, rule, increase, complete, bring up, preserve, chief, determiner, provider, sustainer, perfecter, rewarder, creator, maintainer, reposer of properties, developer, former of rules and laws of the growth, foster a thing in such a manner as to make it attain one condition after another until it reaches its goal of completion.
The word أَنْ comes from the root ا ن and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to seek or take protection, refuge, be next, the bone (flesh). Ma'aadh - a refuge, Ma'aadh Allaah - I seek refuge with Allaah, God forbid, Allaah be my refuge.. . 'Udhtu (prf. 1st. sing.): I sought refuge/protection.. A'uudhu (imp. 1st. sing.): I seek refuge.. Ya'uudhuuna (imp. 3rd. m. pl.): they seek refuge.. U'iidh (imp. 1st. sing. vb. IV): I seek refuge for, do commend (to your) protection.. Ista'idh (prt. m. sing. vb. 10): seek refuge!. Ma'aadhun (pis. pic.): refuge.
data.sentence: The word وَأَعُوذُ comes from the root ع و ذ and is associated with the meanings: to seek or take protection, refuge, be next, the bone (flesh). Ma'aadh - a refuge, Ma'aadh Allaah - I seek refuge with Allaah, God forbid, Allaah be my refuge.. . 'Udhtu (prf. 1st. sing.): I sought refuge/protection.. A'uudhu (imp. 1st. sing.): I seek refuge.. Ya'uudhuuna (imp. 3rd. m. pl.): they seek refuge.. U'iidh (imp. 1st. sing. vb. IV): I seek refuge for, do commend (to your) protection.. Ista'idh (prt. m. sing. vb. 10): seek refuge!. Ma'aadhun (pis. pic.): refuge.

data.meanings: To be present, present at, stand in presence of, hurt, be at hand.
data.sentence: The word يَحْضُرُونِ comes from the root ح ض ر and is associated with the meanings: To be present, present at, stand in presence of, hurt, be at hand.
